page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN ALVA
page.content: The Island House is a film and video workshop. One of its aims is to train unemployed people to work with film and video equipment so they have more chance of getting jobs. The group involved will also go out and film things like the Mini Marathon and then form it into a video tape. The Island House has a small{cinema}that seats 30-40 people. It is situated just at the entrance to the Alva Glen. Small {engineering}firms provide some jobs in Alva,and the Alva{Industrial Estate}is expanding quickly. A small survey showed that three quarters of Alva residents work within 8 miles of their home. The rest travel to their work at places like Grangemouth,Edinburgh and Glasgow.
